requirement_tested: Display a biography website with sections for basic information, life experiences, achievements, and honors.
user_persona: A visitor interested in learning about a notable person's life.
user_goal: To view a complete biography with all major life sections displayed clearly.

narrative_steps.title: Visiting the Biography Page
narrative_steps.description: Sarah navigates to a biography page after clicking on a featured person. She expects to see an organized layout of the individual's life story.
narrative_steps.action: Navigate to a detailed biography page.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Page loads with header showing name, dates, and profile image; followed by Basic Information, Life Experiences, Achievements, and Honors sections vertically arranged.

narrative_steps.title: Reading Through Sections
narrative_steps.description: Sarah scrolls down to read the short bio, then scans through categorized life experiences, achievements, and honors listed chronologically.
narrative_steps.action: Scroll through the page content.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Each section is clearly labeled and visually distinct, with consistent dim gray text on snow background throughout.

requirement_tested: Provide browsing functionality for users to explore different biographies.
user_persona: A curious reader looking to discover new inspiring figures.
user_goal: To browse multiple biographies and select one to learn more about.

narrative_steps.title: Accessing Browse Page
narrative_steps.description: Mark clicks on the 'Browse Biographies' link from the navigation menu to explore available profiles.
narrative_steps.action: Click on 'Browse Biographies' navigation link.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Redirected to a grid page displaying biography cards with images, names, and short bios.

narrative_steps.title: Selecting a Biography
narrative_steps.description: Mark finds an interesting profile and clicks on the card to view full details.
narrative_steps.action: Click on a biography card.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Navigated to the detailed view page for the selected biography.

requirement_tested: Enable detailed view pages for individual biographies.
user_persona: A researcher needing comprehensive information about a specific figure.
user_goal: To access a detailed biography page with extensive content.

narrative_steps.title: Loading Detailed View
narrative_steps.description: Emily selects a biography from the browse page and waits for the detailed view to load.
narrative_steps.action: Navigate to a specific biography's detail page.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Full biography data including extended bio, grouped life experiences, achievements, and honors are displayed in structured sections.

narrative_steps.title: Reviewing Content
narrative_steps.description: Emily reads through each section carefully, noting the depth of information presented.
narrative_steps.action: Scroll through detailed biography content.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Content is well-organized within a fixed-width container, maintaining consistent styling and readability.

requirement_tested: Implement a search feature to allow users to find relevant biographical content.
user_persona: A student researching historical figures for a school project.
user_goal: To quickly locate biographies related to a keyword search.

narrative_steps.title: Initiating Search
narrative_steps.description: John remembers reading about someone who won a Nobel Prize and uses the search bar to find them.
narrative_steps.action: Focus on the search input field and type 'Nobel Prize winner'.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Search suggestions appear below the input as he types.

narrative_steps.title: Submitting Query
narrative_steps.description: After typing his query, John presses Enter to submit the search.
narrative_steps.action: Press Enter key in the search input field.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Redirected to a search results page showing matching biographies and relevant content snippets.

requirement_tested: Apply snow as the background color across all pages.
user_persona: A designer reviewing visual consistency of the website.
user_goal: To verify that all pages maintain a uniform snow background.

narrative_steps.title: Checking Homepage Background
narrative_steps.description: Alex opens the homepage and inspects the background color.
narrative_steps.action: Load the homepage URL.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Background is consistently set to #fffafa (snow) across the entire viewport.

narrative_steps.title: Verifying Other Pages
narrative_steps.description: Alex navigates to several internal pages to ensure the same background persists.
narrative_steps.action: Visit browse, detail, and search result pages.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Every visited page maintains the snow background without variation.

requirement_tested: Style all elements with dim gray color scheme.
user_persona: A UI reviewer ensuring brand compliance.
user_goal: To confirm that all textual and graphical elements use the correct dim gray color.

narrative_steps.title: Inspecting Text Elements
narrative_steps.description: Taylor examines headers, paragraphs, and captions across various pages.
narrative_steps.action: View multiple pages including home, browse, and detail views.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: All text elements are styled with #696969 (dim gray) color.

narrative_steps.title: Checking UI Components
narrative_steps.description: Taylor checks borders, icons, and interactive elements for color consistency.
narrative_steps.action: Inspect search bar, buttons, and navigation links.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Borders, icons, and non-text UI components also utilize the dim gray color scheme.

requirement_tested: Fetch all biography data dynamically from backend APIs.
user_persona: An end-user expecting real-time updated content.
user_goal: To view current biography information fetched live from the backend.

narrative_steps.title: Initial Page Load
narrative_steps.description: Jordan visits the site and observes how content is loaded.
narrative_steps.action: Open the website homepage.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Loading indicators are shown initially before content populates from API calls.

narrative_steps.title: Browsing Dynamic Content
narrative_steps.description: Jordan browses through multiple biographies noticing fresh data loads each time.
narrative_steps.action: Navigate between browse and detail pages.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Content updates dynamically based on API responses with no hard-coded values visible.

requirement_tested: Connect backend to external PostgreSQL database using provided environment variables.
user_persona: A DevOps engineer validating deployment configurations.
user_goal: To confirm backend properly connects to PostgreSQL with specified settings.

narrative_steps.title: Starting Backend Server
narrative_steps.description: DevOps team deploys the backend service with configured environment variables.
narrative_steps.action: Start backend server process with DB_HOST=localhost, DB_PORT=5432, etc.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Server starts successfully and establishes connection to PostgreSQL instance using provided credentials.

narrative_steps.title: Validating Database Queries
narrative_steps.description: Engineer monitors logs to ensure database queries execute correctly.
narrative_steps.action: Trigger API endpoints that require database access.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Database operations complete successfully with accurate data retrieval and storage.

requirement_tested: Include frontend and backend code in repository structure.
user_persona: A developer setting up the local development environment.
user_goal: To clone and build both frontend and backend components seamlessly.

narrative_steps.title: Cloning Repository
narrative_steps.description: Developer clones the repository and explores its structure.
narrative_steps.action: Run git clone command and inspect directory contents.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Repository contains separate frontend/ and backend/ directories with respective source files and package.json.

narrative_steps.title: Locating Key Files
narrative_steps.description: Developer looks for main configuration and entry point files.
narrative_steps.action: Check for index.html, main.js, app.js, and package.json files.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Clear organization allows quick identification of core files in both frontend and backend folders.

requirement_tested: Configure package.json with install:all script to set up both frontend and backend dependencies.
user_persona: A new contributor joining the project team.
user_goal: To easily install all project dependencies with a single command.

narrative_steps.title: Running Install Script
narrative_steps.description: New developer runs the setup command after cloning the repo.
narrative_steps.action: Execute npm run install:all from the root directory.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Dependencies for both frontend and backend are installed automatically without errors.

narrative_steps.title: Confirming Installation Success
narrative_steps.description: Developer verifies that node_modules exist in both subdirectories.
narrative_steps.action: Check presence of node_modules folder in frontend/ and backend/.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Both directories now contain fully installed dependencies ready for development.

requirement_tested: Configure package.json with dev script to run frontend and backend concurrently.
user_persona: A developer beginning daily work session.
user_goal: To start both development servers efficiently for integrated testing.

narrative_steps.title: Launching Development Environment
narrative_steps.description: Developer initiates both frontend and backend services together.
narrative_steps.action: Run npm run dev from the root directory.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Concurrent processes start both frontend dev server and backend API server simultaneously.

narrative_steps.title: Testing Integration
narrative_steps.description: Developer makes sure both systems communicate during runtime.
narrative_steps.action: Access frontend which fetches data from running backend API.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Frontend successfully retrieves and displays live data from backend without connectivity issues.

requirement_tested: Ensure no hard-coded or mock data is used in the application.
user_persona: A quality assurance tester verifying data integrity.
user_goal: To confirm the application relies entirely on real API data.

narrative_steps.title: Observing Initial Load
narrative_steps.description: Tester opens the application and watches for placeholder content.
narrative_steps.action: Load the homepage and browse pages.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Only loading spinners or skeleton screens appear until actual API data arrives.

narrative_steps.title: Verifying Runtime Behavior
narrative_steps.description: Tester ensures no dummy entries remain once data is loaded.
narrative_steps.action: Wait for API responses and inspect rendered content.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Final rendered UI contains exclusively real data sourced from backend APIs.

requirement_tested: Support responsive design for optimal viewing on desktop and mobile devices.
user_persona: A frequent mobile user accessing biographies on-the-go.
user_goal: To navigate and consume content comfortably on a smartphone.

narrative_steps.title: Accessing Site on Mobile
narrative_steps.description: Lisa opens the biography site on her phone and assesses usability.
narrative_steps.action: Visit the site using a mobile browser.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Site layout adapts to narrow screen with stacked cards and readable font sizes.

narrative_steps.title: Switching to Desktop View
narrative_steps.description: Lisa switches to landscape mode and notices layout changes.
narrative_steps.action: Rotate device or resize browser window.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Layout fluidly transitions to multi-column arrangement suitable for wider screens.

requirement_tested: Implement navigation menu for easy access to main sections of the website.
user_persona: A casual visitor wanting intuitive site exploration.
user_goal: To effortlessly move between major areas of the website.

narrative_steps.title: Using Navigation Bar
narrative_steps.description: Robert sees the top navigation bar and decides to visit the browse section.
narrative_steps.action: Click on 'Browse Biographies' link in the fixed navigation menu.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Instantly redirected to the browsing page with biography listings.

narrative_steps.title: Exploring Further
narrative_steps.description: From the browse page, Robert wants to try the search function next.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the 'Search' link in the navigation menu.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Navigation smoothly takes him to the search interface where he can enter keywords.
